add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAsyncFifo.cpp
          VAsyncFifo.h
          VAsyncFifo__Syms.cpp
          VAsyncFifo__Syms.h
          VAsyncFifo__Trace.cpp
          VAsyncFifo__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS AsyncFifo.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AsyncFifo.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/counter/gray/src/GrayCounter.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/memory/blockram/dual-port/src/BlockRamDualPort.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAsyncFifo STATIC
    VAsyncFifo.cpp
    VAsyncFifo__Syms.cpp
    VAsyncFifo__Trace.cpp
    VAsyncFifo__Trace__Slow.cpp
    AsyncFifo.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/counter/gray/src/GrayCounter.v
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/memory/blockram/dual-port/src/BlockRamDualPort.v
)

target_compile_options(VAsyncFifo PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAsyncFifo PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAsyncFifo verilated)
